subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hakeem Olajuwon’s induction into the Basketball Hall of Fame, along with Patrick Ewing’s, was a quirk of fate and a reminder of how unsympathetic it was to Ewing.
snippet: Hakeem Olajuwon’s induction into the Basketball Hall of Fame, along with Patrick Ewing’s, was a quirk of fate and a reminder of how unsympathetic it was to Ewing.
